Title: Relates to exempting certain sales from the tax on alcoholic beverages
Summary: Exempts alcoholic beverages sold at retail by a licensed producer of alcoholic beverages to a customer where such sale occurs either at the brewery, winery or distillery where such alcoholic beverage was produced or as a direct delivery from the tax on alcoholic beverages.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting certain sales from the tax on alcoholic beverages; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
